scripts.build:win: pnpm build && pnpm run prepare:packdeps && pnpm run prepare:workspace-deps && pnpm dlx electron-builder@26.0.12 --win --publish=never
scripts.build:mac: pnpm build && pnpm run prepare:packdeps && pnpm run prepare:workspace-deps && pnpm dlx electron-builder@26.0.12 --mac --publish=never
scripts.build:linux: pnpm build && pnpm run prepare:packdeps && pnpm run prepare:workspace-deps && pnpm dlx electron-builder@26.0.12 --linux --publish=never
scripts.build:linux:appimage: pnpm build && pnpm run prepare:packdeps && pnpm run prepare:workspace-deps && pnpm dlx electron-builder@26.0.12 --linux appimage --publish=never
scripts.build:linux:snap: pnpm build && pnpm run prepare:packdeps && pnpm run prepare:workspace-deps && pnpm dlx electron-builder@26.0.12 --linux snap --publish=never
scripts.build:linux:deb: pnpm build && pnpm run prepare:packdeps && pnpm run prepare:workspace-deps && pnpm dlx electron-builder@26.0.12 --linux deb --publish=never
scripts.build:all: pnpm build && pnpm run prepare:packdeps && pnpm run prepare:workspace-deps && pnpm dlx electron-builder@26.0.12 --win --mac --linux --publish=never
scripts.dist: pnpm build && pnpm run prepare:packdeps && pnpm run prepare:workspace-deps && pnpm dlx electron-builder@26.0.12 --publish=never
